objects.specification: A large rectangular floor plane with a smooth, slightly reflective surface in a neutral light gray color, sized to accommodate a compact or mid-sized car and allow for comfortable pedestrian circulation around its perimeter. The edges are subtly beveled to avoid sharp transitions and the material has a fine texture for traction.

A tall, slender wall with a smooth matte white finish accented by narrow vertical grooves spaced at regular intervals. The top edge features a minimalistic cool light gray trim for a refined, modern aesthetic.

A tall, slender wall with a smooth matte white finish accented by narrow vertical grooves spaced at regular intervals. The top edge features a minimalistic cool light gray trim for a refined, modern aesthetic.

A sleek, modern compact-to-mid-sized car model with smooth aerodynamic curves and a streamlined profile. The body is finished in a glossy deep blue metallic paint, with dark tinted windows, polished silver alloy wheels, and subtle integrated LED lighting accents for a premium showroom presentation.

A sleek, modern registration desk with a high-gloss white lacquer finish and clean geometric lines. It features a minimalist front panel with a recessed signage area, a smooth integrated polished light gray countertop, and concealed cable management channels.

A slim, freestanding promotional display stand with a matte white finish, featuring a gently curved front surface and an integrated brochure holder. The top surface includes a recessed area for logo placement or a small digital display, and the weighted base ensures stability.

A slim, freestanding promotional display stand with a matte white finish, featuring a gently curved front surface and an integrated brochure holder. The top surface includes a recessed area for logo placement or a small digital display, and the weighted base ensures stability.

A modern visitor chair with a contoured seat and backrest upholstered in soft medium gray fabric. The chair sits on slender matte black powder-coated metal legs and features a subtle ergonomic form with a minimalist design aesthetic.

A modern visitor chair with a contoured seat and backrest upholstered in soft medium gray fabric. The chair sits on slender matte black powder-coated metal legs and features a subtle ergonomic form with a minimalist design aesthetic.
A small round visitor table with a smooth white tabletop surface and a slender matte black central pedestal leg. The tabletop features a subtle mitered edge detail for a refined finish.

A compact ceiling-mounted spotlight fixture with a cylindrical white housing, featuring a tilt-adjustable head and integrated LED light source. The design is minimalist with concealed mounting hardware and a subtle polished accent ring.
